Diana Gisela

Interactive Digital Artist and Interaction Designer

ABOUT

Hello! I'm Diana Gisela.

Currently living in Barcelona and passionate about digital arts. My work drawsinspiration from geometric shapes and fractals, and exploration of the body and subconscious through multimedia experiences. I am interested in the intersection between media design and code, constantly in search of new technologies

WORK

Art,Installation, Technology.

Working at the intersection of media, Diana combines sculpture and electronics to explore discomfort, action and inaction, emotions like deception,descontrol,anxiety and the design of purposefully anti-functional objects
